Despite his rambunctious nature, Robert Jr. had a passion for acting from a young age. As he grew older, his talent and dedication earned him a spot at a prestigious performing arts school, where he honed his craft and learned from some of the best instructors in the business.

After graduating from high school, Robert Jr. moved to New York City to pursue his dreams of becoming a famous actor. The show's success catapulted Robert Jr. to stardom, and he quickly became known for his charismatic on-screen presence and impressive comedic timing. He went on to star in a string of hit films, earning critical acclaim and numerous awards and nominations.

He is also an avid surfer and has been known to hit the waves whenever he's not on set. In the 1990s, Downey's career experienced a significant downturn due to his struggles with addiction.
